name: Sailing Tour Around Montego Bay
description: Sailing tour on the north cost of Montego Bay for cruise ship passengers or Hotels guests in Jamaica. Sail and snorkel for four hours and then sightseen. You can also get a full day sail with snorkeling; you will be taken over to snorkel at the Airport Reef bank this one of the best place around. After we have enjoyed the reef we will go for a lovely sail up the coast. A half day sail includes snacks (fresh fruit, bun, or biscuits and cheese) and drinks of all sorts, beer, soft drinks, juice, water and rum) A full day sail includes lunch in addition to the above mentioned drinks and snacks. Imagine yourself on a private yacht cruising off for a unique day of fun in the sun. This is not just another ‘booze cruise’. This is a special and fanciful day out looking for dolphins and colorful fish amongst the reefs outside Montego Bay. Limited to small groups (15 maximum), we will whisk you off to sea from the Mo Bay Yacht club and take you snorkeling (teach you how, if necessary) then sail out to sea or along the coast
